description: Nathan Sommers, Kyle Pierce, Trystian Sweet, Austin Kent, and Ago Viara are poolside downing some beer and soon each other's cocks. Austin and Trystian work on Kyle and Nathan's dicks while Ago stands ready for his turn. They all maneuver around each other so that everyone gets in on the action and a vigorous suck-rim-fuck session ensues. Bosco and Landon join in the fun and all 7 young studs get it on even more intensely than before.
title: Road Trip Vol. 3 - Yosemite
